mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customers (name, surname, phone_number, email, balance, subscription) VALUES (#{name}, #{surname}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{balance}, #{subscription})
mapper.select: SELECT id AS customer_id, name AS customer_name, surname AS customer_surname, phone_number AS customer_phone, email AS customer_email, balance, subscription FROM customers WHERE id = #{id}
